title: you know jungling is trash when you rarely get auto filled support
body:
riot, idk what the fuck you did to jungling this season. What do i do know is every single season prior since the beginning of this dumbass auto fill system. If you got auto filled you ended up as a support most of the time. What happens now? i've been getting so many games where i end up auto filled jungle and this shit is not fun. 

fix jungling

replies.body:
"Level 2 ganking junglers are too influential in the early game. Thus, we're crippling EXP from camps for everybody"

Absolutely no correlation but ok

> [{quoted}](name=GelsominoKiller,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=gAjozeWf,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-05-05T22:56:11.964+0000)
>
> "Level 2 ganking junglers are too influential in the early game. Thus, we're crippling EXP from camps for everybody"
> 
> Absolutely no correlation but ok

junglers are too impactful in the game - nerf xp
junglers are farming in the jungle and not ganking - nerf xp
jungle mains are no longer playing jungle and it is now being autofilled by fill - nerf xp

> [{quoted}](name=GelsominoKiller,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=gAjozeWf,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-05-05T22:56:11.964+0000)
>
> "Level 2 ganking junglers are too influential in the early game. Thus, we're crippling EXP from camps for everybody"
> 
> Absolutely no correlation but ok

junglers were forced because they put all the importance on scuttle, so they put a stop to that.

> [{quoted}](name=MaskedMorals,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=gAjozeWf,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2019-05-05T23:53:47.846+0000)
>
> junglers were forced because they put all the importance on scuttle, so they put a stop to that.

It’s more because riot nerfed late exp to combat early junglers, because that makes sense, so we became worthless late game. 

And now they nerfed early game xp because of early junglers. So we become worthless early game. 

Junglers litteraly have a 2-3 minute window to be useful

You know what's fun? Take {{item:3115}} {{item:3100}}  on {{champion:76}} {{champion:25}}  as you dominate early game with them in jungle, and then just start split pushing turrets when you are 10/0/10.

Mages weren't designed for attack speed, but if you do it, it becomes a monstrous objective killer, especially on these two.

And that's how you create late game on early game champs.

> [{quoted}](name=Illabethe,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=gAjozeWf,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2019-05-07T02:33:39.109+0000)
>
> You know what's fun? Take {{item:3115}} {{item:3100}}  on {{champion:76}} {{champion:25}}  as you dominate early game with them in jungle, and then just start split pushing turrets when you are 10/0/10.
> 
> Mages weren't designed for attack speed, but if you do it, it becomes a monstrous objective killer, especially on these two.
> 
> And that's how you create late game on early game champs.

Reasons ap conversion damage to turrets was a mistake. Lul

Yes but I'm not complaining. With just 2 items, Nidalee can kill a turret in 5 Q's.

2 items into Morgana jung I'm doing 242 damage to  turret with an auto.

That's also why Diana just face-rolls turrets.
And also the reason why {{champion:115}} lost his niche, afaik.

> [{quoted}](name=GelsominoKiller,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=gAjozeWf,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-05-05T22:56:11.964+0000)
>
> "Level 2 ganking junglers are too influential in the early game. Thus, we're crippling EXP from camps for everybody"
> 
> Absolutely no correlation but ok

"Also here's a crab that spawns when you're barely level 2 and you need it to stay relevant."
:crab: tank/scaling junglers are gone :crab:
Absolutely ~~no~~ the opposite correlation but ok

While his quote isn't 100% correct, it was pretty much the gist of it. Junglers ganked too much, so they crush XP which inadvertently has the opposite of the intended effect, as now the only decent opiton is to gank gank gank

riot screwed up the jungle. their insistent on nerfing the ENTIRE jungle instead of specific junglers just ruined jungle for all jungle mains. I've personally stopped playing rank and now just play top/mid or dodge whenever im jungle

I thought top was the dead lane

I get put there way more often than support, and I'm even queing for support

> [{quoted}](name=Jimmy Rustles,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=gAjozeWf,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-05-05T19:41:04.431+0000)
>
> I thought top was the dead lane
> 
> I get put there way more often than support, and I'm even queing for support

it might be different for you, im currently running around silver 1 and 2, if i get auto filled i either get filled jungle or support but 90% i have to rock the smite and deal with the inevitable feeder on the team

> [{quoted}](name=Jimmy Rustles,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=gAjozeWf,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-05-05T19:41:04.431+0000)
>
> I thought top was the dead lane
> 
> I get put there way more often than support, and I'm even queing for support

Top dies the higher you go. 

At around plat top is basically dead. So often i play against autofills its insane.

remember when jg mains were saying this change was bad, and a bunch of brainless sheep couldnt see anything but "durrr jg nerfs good" so they went through with it anyway? maybe mains in a role should be listened to hmmmmm

Or, maybe they suck at adjusting, favor one pathing and are lost when that no longer works for them.

Speaking as a jungler, btw.
because thats the problem, not the role just being not fun whatsoever because they blindly nerf exp instead of fixing actual issue like respawn timers and early duelist power

What can I say? I get to level 6 before I ever recall, so I don't exactly know what you're suffering from.....  Not hard to Red>Krug >Raptor > Scuttle >Gank > Blue > Gank > Gromp > Wolves > Gank > Raptors > Recall > Krugs > Gank > Red > Scuttle > Gank.....

My level 6 arrives at around 6:58. Dunno about you....
both scuttles can easily be taken out of that by the enemy, literally every one of those ganks can also be taken out, not every match is perfect unless your fighting inbreds
I show up at scuttle 3 seconds before it spawns. Already level 3. Smite still in hand.
ok thats one scuttle, and the other? and the ganks? exactly, on top of the fact the first scuttle is VERY contestable still
support is just Midlane now but no longer need to cs.
is support even that bad though? nowadays you can just take a ''support'' mage or a ''support''assassin bot to act as a ''support''

Death is the best CC!

look up Talon Support ,   XD there's a high level match featuring it
I always get autoflled support lol

Well at least they did the right thing to prevent lvl 2 ganks now and changed spawn time of Scuttle.
But now they should revert at least the LAST xp nerf.

I don't know about you, but I do fine because my route and XP hasn't changed much since they started "Nerfing." 

Yes. My teams often feed. 

Yes. My feeding team gets defensive when they practically int while even though I've ganked their lane 4 times ...... right after I leave the gank.

Yes. My bot lane doesn't ward drakes.

But what's new about all that? They've always done all that.

-----------------------

What's changed:

1) most junglers are now pushing ~50% win rates and they don't like it. Most are used to champs holding 54-57% Win rates, and they notice the difference.

2) Traditional trades between junglers generally lacked sustain early game and took several hits. Now, many are either PTA or Conquerer, and trading is dangerous.

3) Ward Destruction has become the full - on meta.

4) Some skirmisher junglers have not had kit updates in forever and poorly associate with current runes and fast skirmishes, making all rounder junglers worse off than they used to be.

Dude i fucking hate getting auto-filled into jungle. Holy crap, that is the most unenjoyable player experience possible.

If you don't pick something that ganks at level 2 and turns the entire game into a instant snowball team death match, your trolling, it's your fault the team lost, and their grandma died, and their dog fell down a well, and just HOLY CRAP.

Like dude, i hit level 2, and you guys died by yourself on the other side of the map, to your own lane, and that's MY fault.

I dodge when i get filled into jungle now. You cannot PAY me to play that shit.
I get filled into Top most, then Jungle, then Support; I'm at the Low Gold level on EUW.
Jungle is a troll lane.

I never got autofilled Jg lol
Mostly Support or Adc , sometimes Top , but never got autofilled JG nor Mid not even once
My auto fill experience is support then top then jungle
Im picking mid primary and support secondary, almost never get support

I exclusively fill and used to see 60-70% support games. Since the jungle chance it's more like 40% jung 40% supp 20% everything else. The role has been nerfed to a point where it's difficult to keep up with laners.

_THAT BEING SAID_ - is this such a bad thing? Sure, it's less fun from the jungler's perspective, but from a macro perspective doesn't this just make it so that the game isn't just a "better jungler wins" match? Jungle is my favorite role and while I don't love how much more difficult it is to play, I will say that this does provide other lanes opportunity to carry.
